topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/538f9e646368722af8770000#post_538f9e646368722af8770000
True, but my step dad hates spiders so that was all on him.

Plus even so, this things extremely dangerous. 

We use our shed too so the likelihood of _not_ pissing it off is very slim.

You see we made an apartment on top of our shed for my sister so this gal could go up there, bite her or her cats and well, that would be bad news.

Though I did feel really bad since it was just so, Beautiful and amazing looking.

So trust me, everyone was kinda upset it had to go.
